title: how can we dispose of a gas grill. NOT a tank.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question.  The New Hanover County landfill accepts scrap metal items for recycling. For disposing of propane tanks:  http://www.myreporter.com/2010/04/where-or-how-can-safely-dispose-of-old-propane-tanks-for-a-grill/
